Don't use Ciemnozielony's crack, he's advertising something dangerous. I can confirm this works installs and works perfectly fine on XP SP3. It uses a standard Clickteam installer which can be popular among quite the amount of torrents. I haven't known it to set off any false positives, but if it does that would be why.
